items.name: TV
items.description: This TV gets all five channels!

items.name: VHS rewinder
items.description: This beautiful old looking car will rewind your VHS cassettes for you! Don't waste time using your VCR to rewind your tapes. Rewind one while you watch another!

items.name: Sony Walkman
items.description: Play your own music on the go without bothering anyone else! This top of the line cassette player is the first of its kind!

items.name: Betamax Player
items.description: This is the better format, no matter what everyone else says!

items.name: Atari 2600
items.description: You can play with your friends!
